description: Newtons first law of motion states that a body will continue to be in a state of motion or rest until an external force acts on it.
heading: "Motion ","Force ","Rest "
head_description: "The state of the body where the position of the body changes with time.","The external agent that changes the state of the body.","The state of the body where the position of the body does not change with time."
